resources.string: Effortless identify & detect AI - generated Images with our advanced algorithm. Simply input your video, and we will quickly analyze it to detect AI patterns
Introducing our deepfake detection app, it uses advanced algorithms and machine learning to spot manipulated media. Combat fake news and verify authenticity with ease.
here you can upload your video

Contact Us

 If you have any questions about our Deepfake Detection service, please feel free to contact us:

 Email: support@deepfakedetector.com
 Phone: +1 (555) 123-4567

 Our team is available Monday through Friday, 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM EST.

 For technical issues or concerns about potential deepfake videos, please include relevant details in your message.

Terms and Conditions

 1. Service Description
 Our app provides deepfake detection services using CNN-based artificial intelligence technology.

 2. User Responsibilities
 - Users must only upload videos they have legal rights to analyze
 - Users must not attempt to overload or damage our systems
 - Users understand that detection results are probabilistic and not guaranteed

 3. Service Limitations
 - Maximum video file size: 100MB
 - Supported formats: MP4, AVI, MOV
 - Processing time may vary based on video length and complexity

 4. Privacy
 - Uploaded videos are processed securely
 - We do not store videos longer than necessary for analysis
 - Detection results are confidential

 5. Disclaimer
 While we strive for accuracy, our service may not detect all deepfake content.

Privacy Policy

 1. Data Collection
 We collect:
 - Uploaded video data
 - Basic device information
 - Usage statistics

 2. Data Usage
 Your data is used to:
 - Perform deepfake detection
 - Improve our detection algorithms
 - Maintain service quality

 3. Data Protection
 - All uploads are encrypted
 - Videos are automatically deleted after analysis
 - No personal data is shared with third parties

 4. User Rights
 You have the right to:
 - Request data deletion
 - Access your usage history
 - Opt-out of analytics

 5. Contact
 For privacy concerns, contact our Data Protection Officer at privacy@deepfakedetector.com
